discovery

Class NetworkDiscovery

  • java.lang.Object
    • discovery.NetworkDiscovery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class NetworkDiscovery
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class will discovery the specificed network and display it on the GUI

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkDiscovery

        public NetworkDiscovery(Browser browser,
                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> discoveredIPs,
                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nodeIPs,
                NodeList nodes,
                ConnectionList connections,
                LogBox _logBox,
                javafx.scene.control.Button[] buttons,
                java.lang.String srcIP,
                java.lang.String dstIP,
                java.lang.String username,
                java.lang.String password)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Discovers the network from the startAddress and generates a graph object
        Parameters:
        browser - - Global reference to Browser object to display network topology
        discoveredIPs - - Global reference to ArrayList of discovered IP addresses
        nodeIPs - -
        nodes - - Global reference to NodeList of nodes
        connections - - Global reference to ConnectionList of all connections
        _logBox - - Global reference to the LogBox for logging
        buttons - - Button[] reference to buttons in the Gui
        srcIP - - String of the source IP address
        dstIP - - String of the destination IP address
        username - - the username for all devices in the network
        password - - the password for all devices in the network
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

    • Method Detail

      • getNeighbors

        private com.cisco.onep.topology.Graph getNeighbors(com.cisco.onep.element.NetworkElement node,
                                         java.lang.String username,
                                         java.lang.String password)
                                            throws com.cisco.onep.core.exception.OnepException
        This will recursively run through each router in the network and get a list of neighbors and add those neighbors to the master topology
        Parameters:
        node - The network element we are checking
        username - The username for the device
        password - The password for the device
        Returns:
        ONEpk Graph object
        Throws:
        com.cisco.onep.core.exception.OnepException

      • addressInNetwork

        private boolean addressInNetwork(java.net.InetAddress address)
        Checks to see if the IP address is in our master list of addresses
        Parameters:
        address - - We check to see if this address in the global blacklist of addresses
        Returns:
        True if we already have seen this address
